tool_description: Selects optimal forecasting models based on data characteristics, pattern classification, and historical performance metrics.

data_characteristics.description: Data characteristics like seasonality, trend, volatility

forecast_horizon.description: Number of periods to forecast ahead

available_models.description: Available forecasting models to choose from

error_messages: Invalid data characteristics: Use recognized characteristics like seasonal, trending, volatile, sparse
Unknown demand pattern: Pattern must be one of smooth, intermittent, lumpy, erratic
Invalid forecast horizon: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 365
No models available: At least one forecasting model must be specified
usage: Specify data_characteristics array, demand_pattern, and forecast_horizon. Optionally limit available_models for selection.

alternative_models.description: Alternative model options ranked by suitability
